threeSteps.heading: How does Mister Imot work?

step1.label: Browse the map
step1.content:
Real location of new projects.
Photos, plans and developer profiles. Everything in one place.

step2.label: Connect directly
step2.content: Ask questions, schedule a viewing or simply visit the site to see the project up close. No intermediaries.

step3.label: Buy at real price
step3.content:
No commissions, no hidden fees.
Only direct deal between buyer and developer. Save money and time.

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about using Mister Imot Platform

question1.question: How can I find new apartments or houses in my city?
question1.answer: Open the map at mrimot.com/listings and explore projects in your city. Each project is posted by a verified developer, not a broker. You can view location details, visit sites in person, and contact developers directly. No registration is required to browse and explore all listings.

question2.question: Are the projects on the platform reliable?
question2.answer: Every project is posted by a verified developer. Developers are accountable for the accuracy of their listing details. Our verification confirms the developer identity, ensuring you can trust the source while connecting directly with legitimate builders without middlemen.

question3.question: What does it cost to list a project?
question3.answer: Listing projects is completely free. Verified developers can post an unlimited number of residential projects at no charge, helping them reach buyers directly without middlemen.

question4.question: Do I need to register to browse listings?
question4.answer: No registration is required. You can search, explore, and view all projects completely open.

question5.question: Does it cost money for buyers to use the platform?
question5.answer: Browsing listings, checking project details, and contacting developers directly is 100% free. Buyers can explore all verified developer projects without any fees, advertisements, or hidden costs.

question6.question: What does it take to get verified as a developer?
question6.answer: Our team manually verifies developers through direct contact via phone or email. The process confirms your identity and role in the project, ensuring only genuine developers can post listings and that buyers see authentic sources.

question7.question: Are only developers allowed on the platform?
question7.answer: Yes. Only verified real estate developers can post projects. Brokers or third parties are not allowed unless explicitly authorized by the developer, ensuring a trustworthy platform for buyers.

question8.question: How long does verification take?
question8.answer: Verification is usually completed within 48 hours. We prioritize speed while ensuring accuracy, so developers can post projects quickly and buyers can access verified listings reliably.

question9.question: How do I post a project after verification?
question9.answer: Once verified, developers gain access to a dashboard where they can post unlimited projects. Step-by-step video tutorials and support are available to assist with posting and managing listings effectively.

about.pageDescription: Learn about Mister Imot's mission to revolutionize real estate in Bulgaria through verified developers and transparent property listings.
about.storyDescription: Founded with a vision to transform Bulgaria's real estate market, Mister Imot has become the trusted platform for property buyers and developers alike.
about.missionDescription: At Mister Imot, our mission is to revolutionize the real estate market by creating a transparent and direct connection between property buyers and real estate developers. We believe in cutting out unnecessary intermediaries, reducing costs, and providing direct access to verified, under-construction projects.
about.missionDescription2: We empower buyers to make informed decisions and help developers showcase their work efficiently to a targeted audience.
about.visionDescription: We envision a world where finding and investing in new real estate is simple, direct, and trustworthy. Mister Imot aims to be the go-to platform for anyone seeking new construction properties and for developers looking to list their projects with confidence and ease.
about.visionDescription2: We are committed to fostering a community where quality projects meet genuine demand, creating value for everyone involved.
about.visionImageAlt: Our Vision - Future of Real Estate
about.valuesDescription: Our core values guide every decision we make and every feature we build
about.trustTransparencyDesc: Every listing is verified and every developer is authenticated to ensure complete transparency.
about.directConnectionDesc: We eliminate intermediaries, connecting buyers directly with developers for honest communication.
about.innovationDesc: Leveraging cutting-edge technology to make real estate discovery simple and efficient.
about.customerFirstDesc: Your success is our success. We're committed to providing exceptional service at every step.
about.builtWithGoal: We've built Mister Imot with one goal in mind: making real estate investment simple, transparent, and profitable for everyone involved.
about.directAccess: Direct access to developers, no brokers involved
about.verifiedListings: 100% verified listings of projects under construction
about.saveCommissions: Save on commissions and avoid fake listings
about.userFriendly: User-friendly platform with powerful search and map features
about.realtimeUpdates: Real-time project updates and progress tracking
about.successImageAlt: Happy customers with their new home
about.readyToFind: Ready to Find Your Perfect Property?
about.dontWait: Don't wait! Start exploring verified projects and connect directly with developers today.

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.description: Manage your subscription and view upcoming pricing plans
billing.platformFree: Platform is FREE during development period
billing.platformFreeDescription: Use the platform extensively while it's completely free! Build your property portfolio, connect with qualified buyers, and grow your business at no cost.
billing.joinDevelopers: üè† Join developers who are already growing their business
billing.first50Developers: You're now among the first 50 developers to get:
billing.contactDirectly: We'll contact you directly when pricing goes live with your exclusive offer.
billing.waitlistDescription: Be among the first 50 developers to join our exclusive waitlist for special pricing.
billing.howMuchWilling: How much are you willing to pay monthly?
billing.validAmount: Please enter a valid amount between 1-5000 BGN to join the waitlist.
billing.errorJoiningWaitlist: There was an error joining the waitlist. Please try again.
billing.builtForBulgarian: Built specifically for Bulgarian real estate developers
billing.qualifiedLeadsDesc: Get leads from buyers specifically looking for your properties. No wasted time on unqualified inquiries.
billing.exclusiveListingsDesc: Your listings are exclusively yours. No duplicate listings or stolen content like other platforms.
billing.noBrokersDesc: Connect directly with buyers. Cut out the middleman and maximize your profits.
billing.payOnlyWhatYouUse: Pay only for what you use. Rotate your listings as needed - when one sells, activate another.
billing.step1: Choose how many active project listings you want
billing.step2: Pay monthly for your active project listings
billing.step3: Rotate listings as projects sell out
billing.competitiveTransparent: Pricing will be competitive and transparent
billing.noHiddenFees: No hidden fees, no long-term contracts
billing.earlySupporterDesc: Developers who join our waitlist get up to 30% early-bird discount and priority support when pricing launches.
billing.whenPricingAvailableAnswer: We're gathering feedback from developers like you to set fair pricing. Launch expected in the coming months.
billing.howPerListingWorks: How does the per-listing model work?
billing.howPerListingWorksAnswer: You pay monthly for each active project listing. When a project sells out, you can deactivate it and activate another one.
billing.whatHappensCurrentListings: What happens to my current listings?
billing.whatHappensCurrentListingsAnswer: All your current listings and data will be preserved for paying users when we transition to paid plans.
billing.canChangeActiveListings: Can I change my active listings?
billing.canChangeActiveListingsAnswer: Absolutely! You can rotate project listings as needed - deactivate sold-out projects and activate new ones.
billing.isThereContractAnswer: No long-term contracts. Pay monthly and cancel anytime. We believe in earning your business every month.
billing.whatIfDontSubscribe: What happens if I don't subscribe?
billing.whatIfDontSubscribeAnswer: Your listings will be frozen and hidden from public view until you subscribe to keep them active.
